title: Sundeck and Lounge Area, Pet Friendly, Pets allowed!
posting_body: Park Terrace is located in the heart of midtown on Poplar Avenue across from Overton Park.
With Overton Park at your doorstep and walking distance to Overton Square, you are sure to love Park Terrace.
Our community offers amenities such as off-street parking, on-site laundry, and a beautiful courtyard.
Our charming apartment homes boast lots of natural light, crown-molding, high ceilings, and original hardwood floors.
Park Terrace offers studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartments.
Select units have private balconies and upgraded units are available.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
